entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -25.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -32.6°C
Wind: NW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
